Title: Learn from the valiant standard-bearer of the Great Cultural Revolution, comrade Jiang Qing, and pay her respect!
Notes: This is one of the very few posters on which Jiang Qing is glorified herself, without any reference to Mao.It was jointly published by the following organizations:Head Department of Literature and Art (Hubei)Literature and Art Revolutionary Department (Wuhan)Minorities Academy (Zhongnan). Faculty of Chinese. Revolutionary CommitteeWuhan Normal Academy. Faculty of Chinese. Revolutionary CommitteeSteel Works Assembled Cities Literature and Art DepartmentXinhu Art Revolutionary CommitteeHuazhong Normal Academy. Faculty of Chinese. Revolutionary Committee
